front.title: Transferring Bulk Data over the GeneRic Autonomic Signaling Protocol (GRASP)

abstract.t: This document describes how bulk data may be transferred between Autonomic Service Agents via the GeneRic Autonomic Signaling Protocol (GRASP). Although not an equivalent of a file transfer protocol, such a technique may be used for non-urgent transfer of data too large to fit into a normal GRASP message.
